## StyleKey type

Keys that can be explicitly set on a style. Used to track which properties have been set vs using defaults.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type StyleKey = keyof StyleOptions;
```
**References:** [StyleOptions](./chapstick.styleoptions.md)
